mapper.select: SELECT user.user_id, user.phone_number, user.user_status, user.user_reg_date, user.user_name, user.user_email, user.level, user.profileIcon_id, COUNT(invest.hw_id) AS investment_count, COALESCE(SUM(invest.hw_invest_fil), 0) AS total_investment_fil, (SELECT SUM(hrsd.reward_fil) from hw_reward_sharing_detail hrsd WHERE hrsd.user_id=user.user_id GROUP BY hrsd.user_id) as total_reward_fil FROM user_info user LEFT JOIN hw_investment invest ON user.user_id = invest.user_id WHERE user.user_status != 'inactive' GROUP BY user.user_email ORDER BY user.user_reg_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(user_id) AS user_id FROM user_info;
select user_id, phone_number, user_status, user_reg_date, user_name, user_email, level, profileIcon_id from user_info where user_email=#{user_email}
select password from user_info where user_id=#{user_id}

SELECT user.user_id, user.phone_number, user.user_status, user.user_reg_date, user.user_name, user.user_email, user.level, user.profileIcon_id, COUNT(invest.hw_id) AS investment_count, COALESCE(SUM(invest.hw_invest_fil), 0) AS total_investment_fil, (SELECT SUM(hrsd.reward_fil) from hw_reward_sharing_detail hrsd WHERE hrsd.user_id=user.user_id GROUP BY hrsd.user_id) as total_reward_fil, (SELECT SUM(transaction.fil_amount) from transaction transaction WHERE transaction.status='출금신청' AND transaction.user_id=user.user_id GROUP BY transaction.user_id) as processed_fil, (SELECT SUM(transaction.fil_amount) from transaction transaction WHERE transaction.status='출금완료' AND transaction.user_id=user.user_id GROUP BY transaction.user_id) as paid_fil FROM user_info user LEFT JOIN hw_investment invest ON user.user_id = invest.user_id WHERE user.user_id=#{user_id}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(invest.hw_invest_fil), 0) AS total_investment_fil, (SELECT SUM(hrsd.reward_fil) from hw_reward_sharing_detail hrsd INNER JOIN hw_reward_sharing hrs ON hrsd.hw_reward_sharing_id = hrs.reward_sharing_id WHERE hrsd.user_id=user.user_id AND hrs.hw_product_id=#{hw_product_id} GROUP BY hrsd.user_id) as total_reward_fil, (SELECT SUM(transaction.fil_amount) from transaction transaction WHERE transaction.status='출금신청' AND transaction.user_id=user.user_id GROUP BY transaction.user_id) as processed_fil, (SELECT SUM(transaction.fil_amount) from transaction transaction WHERE transaction.status='출금완료' AND transaction.user_id=user.user_id GROUP BY transaction.user_id) as paid_fil FROM user_info user LEFT JOIN hw_investment invest ON user.user_id = invest.user_id WHERE user.user_id=#{user_id}
